column1: Non_Frauds
Hello, this is your mobile service provider. We are calling to inform you about a new promotional offer for unlimited data plans. No sensitive information will be requested during this call.
Congratulations! You have been selected as a winner in a customer loyalty program. As a reward, you will receive a gift voucher in the mail. We just need to confirm your mailing address.
Good afternoon! This is a reminder from your local library regarding the upcoming due dates for borrowed books. Feel free to visit our website for more information.

Hello, this is the customer support team for your favorite online shopping platform. We noticed that you recently made a purchase and wanted to ensure your satisfaction. If you have any concerns, please let us know.

Thank you for being a valued customer of our cable TV services. We are calling to inform you about a new channel lineup that includes additional entertainment options. Enjoy your enhanced viewing experience!

Hello, this is the customer service department of your credit card company. We noticed a transaction on your account and wanted to confirm its authenticity. If you made the purchase, no action is required.

Good morning! This is your insurance provider calling to provide information about a new policy option that may better suit your needs. Take your time to review the details and contact us if interested.
Hello, this is the travel agency you recently booked a trip with. We are calling to provide you with additional details and confirm your travel itinerary. If you have any questions, feel free to ask.
Thank you for using our ride-sharing service. We noticed that you recently took a trip and wanted to thank you for choosing our platform. We appreciate your business!
Hello, this is your utility company calling to remind you about an upcoming scheduled maintenance in your area. There will be a temporary interruption in service, but it will be restored shortly.

Good afternoon! This is the customer support team for your favorite online streaming platform. We noticed that you experienced buffering issues and wanted to offer some troubleshooting tips to enhance your streaming experience.

Hello, this is the bank's customer service department. We wanted to inform you about a new savings account option that offers higher interest rates. If you're interested, we can provide more information.
Thank you for being a valued customer of our internet service. We are calling to inform you about an upgrade option that will provide faster internet speeds. Feel free to contact us for more details.
Good morning! This is your fitness center calling to remind you about your upcoming workout session with a personal trainer. We look forward to helping you reach your fitness goals.
Hello, this is your auto dealership reminding you about the scheduled maintenance for your vehicle. It's important to keep your car in good condition for optimal performance and safety.
Thank you for being a loyal customer of our restaurant. We are calling to inform you about our new menu items and special offers. We hope to see you soon!
Good afternoon! This is the customer support team for your preferred software provider. We noticed that you recently downloaded our application and wanted to ensure a smooth user experience.
Hello, this is your credit card company calling to inform you about a limited-time cashback promotion. Simply use your card for eligible purchases and earn cashback rewards.
Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. We are calling to provide you with exclusive updates and offers. If you wish to unsubscribe, please let us know.
Good morning! This is your healthcare provider calling to remind you about an upcoming appointment with your primary care physician. If you need to reschedule, please contact our office.
Hello, this is your favorite bookstore calling to let you know about our upcoming book signing event. You'll have the opportunity to meet a popular author. Save the date!
Thank you for being a valued customer of our home security services. We are calling to offer you an upgrade option with enhanced features for added peace of mind.
Good afternoon! This is your credit union calling to inform you about a special interest rate offer on personal loans. If you're interested in borrowing, we can provide more details.
Hello, this is your wireless provider calling to inform you about a network coverage expansion in your area. You can expect improved signal strength and better call quality.
Thank you for using our online ticketing service. We are calling to inform you about an upcoming concert in your city. Get ready for a memorable evening of music!

Oh, I see. Could you provide more details about the product?
Hi, it's your cousin Lisa! How have you been? Oh, hey Lisa! I'm doing well, thanks. How about you?
